casebody.data:
In the MATTER OF Isadore H. MAY, an Attorney At Law (Attorney No. 021531985) D-113 September Term 2017
080955 Supreme Court of New Jersey. March 29, 2018

ORDER

This matter having been duly presented, it is ORDERED that ISADORE H. MAY of VENTNOR, who was admitted to the bar of this State in 1985, and who was suspended from the practice of law for a period of three years, retroactive to May 10, 2012, by Order of this Court filed July 20, 2017, be restored to the practice of law, effective immediately.
